text: "Condemnation" is a 1993 song by Depeche Mode and is the third single from their eighth studio album Songs of Faith and Devotion. It went to number 9 in the United Kingdom, Spain and Denmark, number 19 in Ireland, number 1 in Portugal, number 3 in Sweden and number 5 in Finland. ==Track listings== All songs were written by Martin Gore.
